review.description: Been for brunch and for dinner at the bar already in the couple weeks it's been open  - food is creative and nicely done, service is great, does NOT feel like they just opened.  This is exactly what our street needed!!!
review.author: Erin E.

review.description: I stopped by the Custom House after dinner today for a few drinks. It's a great addition to the neighborhood. Beautifully decorated, laid back, nice TVs for watching the game.
review.author: S K.

review.description: The custom house is a great bar. The staff are very kind and attentive and the toilets are very clean. The bar has a great range and the food is great. Food is available nearly all day.
review.author: Daniel K.

review.description: Y'all are haters! This place was great. Nice size glass of wine for a good price ($7), delicious and not too creamy spinach dip, great healthy salad for me and yummy steak sandwich for my companion. Was crowded and buzzing on a the Friday night I ventured out, and had a good, fun, laid back vibe going. A great addition to the neighborhood!
review.author: Julie K.
